betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You will need some hydrogen fluoride for use in making hexafluorosilicic acid and molten cryolite in order to process alumina into aluminium.

To make the Hydrogen Fluoride craft
1 Bronze Mixer
1 Bronze turbine and appropiate burning box and boiler
or diesel generator

You will need to pipe in your Sulfuric acid and put in 3 fluorite dusts (any color dust will work).

Once running you will get 6 Calcium Sulfate Dust and 4 Hydrogen Fluoride fluid.  You will need to pipe the Hydrogen Fluoride to the next quest to continue the process.
§a§6
The recipe:
3 Fluorite Dusts (any color) + 7000L Sulfuric Acid => [Mixer 16/RU/t] => 6 Calcium Sulfacte Dusts + 4000L Hydrogen Sulfide.
§a§f§6§a
To complete the quest colelect in a drum:
1000L of Hydrogen Fluoride
§9§b
Note:  You cannot collect Hydrogen Fluoride with a bucket, you need to use a drum.  You can empty the fluid from the drum into the mixer for the next two quests.
